channel.title: The system cannot find the path specified?plz help me
channel.description:
I have a problem of my own, but i know its not because of the server
When i run the server it says
"The system cannot find the path specified Press any key to continue...."
What i dont get is...: 1. I have the lastest jdk version 2. I set Environmental variable correctly 3. Edited the run file and changed it to my jdk version
Someone please help me ASAP

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified?plz help me
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Okay looked at summerbright the problem is it users jre to open up.
This is 64 bit
@echo off
title EmpireScape
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

so try @echo off
title EmpireScape
cd ./Class/
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

try one of those two if those don’t work I am not sure.

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified?plz help me

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified?plz help me
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Try this

@echo off
title The Summerbright Project
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\java.exe” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
